FuncDef:
The esqm protocol tcp enable command enables a device from performing ESQM for Transmission Control Protocol (TCP) packets.
The undo esqm protocol tcp enable command disables a device to perform ESQM for TCP packets.
By default, after ESQM is enabled on a device, the device will not perform ESQM for TCP packets.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After ESQM is enabled on a device, the device will not perform ESQM for TCP packets by default. To enable the device from performing ESQM for TCP packets, run the esqm protocol tcp enable command.
